By Lisa Shock on Sunday, February 7, 2010 - 06:24 am:

Do you understand that the entire game is in Japanese? To set up your character and such you have to play through a series of menus that involve a lot of reading.

That said, right now, the IP block isn't letting any of us play. So, unless you are accessing the internet from inside japan, you're out of luck.
